heading: HR00480
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE NATIONAL DENGUE PREVENTION AND CONTROL PROGRAM OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, REVIEW THE PROCESSING AND REGISTRATION OF THE DENGUE VACCINE INCLUDING THE CONTRACT TO PURCHASE FROM SANOFI PASTEUR, EXAMINE RELEVANT RESEARCH AND STUDIES ON THE EFFICACY AND SAFETY OF THE VACCINE AND PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES THAT PROMOTE PUBLIC SAFETY
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00480
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE NATIONAL DENGUE PREVENTION AND CONTROL PROGRAM OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, REVIEW THE PROCESSING AND REGISTRATION OF THE DENGUE VACCINE INCLUDING THE CONTRACT TO PURCHASE FROM SANOFI PASTEUR, EXAMINE RELEVANT RESEARCH AND STUDIES ON THE EFFICACY AND SAFETY OF THE VACCINE AND PROPOSE REMEDIAL MEASURES THAT PROMOTE PUBLIC SAFETY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2016-10-17
REMARKS: Change of referral from Health to Good Government and Public Accountability,and Health on Dec. 12, 2016
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE REPORT NO. 01336
SUBMITTED ON 2019-06-04
SUBMITTED BY: GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY, HEALTH
RECOMMENDATIONS: Informing the House of their findings and recommendations
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY ON 2016-12-12
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HEALTH
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-11-07;PRIMARILY REFERRED TO HEALTH on 2016-11-14;
DATE INCLUDED IN OB: 2019-06-04
SECOND READING INFORMATION
RESOLUTION ADOPTED ON SECOND READING : 2019-06-04
REMARKS : Change of referral from Health to Good Government and Public Accountability, and Health on Dec.12, 2016
